channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Responsive Tabs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Responsive Tabs

item.title: CVE-2024-1846|2024-04-15T05:00:05.144Z -- Unknown -- Responsive Tabs
item.description: The Responsive Tabs WordPress plugin before 4.0.7 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
